roleset.name: having no tolerance
roleset.note: INTOLERANT-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on medi-tmprl. Relation to tolerate.01, intolerable.01. (from intolerant.01-j)

example.name: arg0
example.text: In the past , we had tried a variety of vasodilators , but she either was intolerant or had no benefit from a variety of calcium - channel blockers .

roleset.name: not able to be tolerated
roleset.note: INTOLERABLE-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on medi-tmprl1to8. Relation to tolerate.01. (from intolerable.01-j)

example.name: arg1
example.text: Says today that the dyspnea that slowly returns is intolerable and feels very limited .
